component.summary: 予定の表示と計画をします
Hwɛ anaa hyehyɛ wo nnwuma ahoroɔ

description.p: A slim, lightweight calendar app that syncs and manages multiple calendars in one place, like Google Calendar, Outlook and CalDAV.
輕巧的行事曆程式，讓您在同一處同步、管理多本行事曆，例如 Google 行事曆、Outlook 和 CalDAV 等。
简约的轻量级日历应用，一站式同步和管理多个日历，包括 Google 日历 、Outlook 和 CalDAV。
Витончений та легкий календар, що дає можливість синхронізувати та керувати кількома календарями в одному місці, такими як Google Календар, Outlook та CalDAV.
گۇگۇل كالېندارى، Outlook ۋە CalDAV قاتارلىق كالېندارلارنى بىريەردە باشقۇرغىلى بولىدىغان ئاددىي، يىنىك دەرىجىلىك كالېندار ئەپى.
Google Takvim, Outlook ve CalDAV gibi birden fazla takvimi tek bir noktadan eşitleyip yönetebileceğiniz ince, hafif ve son derece kullanışlı bir takvim uygulaması.
Leki program kalyndorza, co synchrōnizuje i regyruje wielōma kalyndorzami we jednym miyjscu, jak Google Calendar, Outlook i CalDAV.
Ett smidigt och lätt kalenderprogram som synkar och hanterar flera kalendrar på en plats, såsom Google Calendar, Outlook och CalDAV.
Мали, лаган календар који усклађује и управља са више календара на једном месту, као што је Гугл календар, Аутлук и КолДАВ.
Një program i lehtë për kalendarin që sinkronizon dhe menaxhon një shumëllojshmëri kalendarësh në një vend të vetëm, si Google Calendar, Outlook dhe CalDAV.
Vitka, lahkotna koledarska aplikacija, ki se usklajuje in upravlja z več koledarji na enem mestu, kot so Google koledar, Outlook ali CalDAV.
Malá a jednoduchá aplikácia, ktorá umožňuje synchronizáciu a správu viacerých kalendárov na jednom mieste, ako napríklad Google Kalendár, Outlook a CalDAV.
Легкий и изящный календарь, поддерживающий синхронизацию с Google Календарь, Outlook и CalDAV.
Um enxuto, leve aplicativo de calendário que sincroniza e gerencia múltiplos calendários em um único lugar, como o Google Calendário, Outlook e o CalDAV.
Uma pequena e leve aplicação de calendário capaz de sincronizar vários calendários num só lugar, como o Google Calendar, Outlook e CalDAV.
Niewielki i lekki program, który synchronizuje i zarządza wieloma kalendarzami w jednym miejscu, jak Google Calendar, Outlook i CalDAV.
Ein slank og lett kalenderapplikasjon som synkroniserer og handsamar fleire kalenderar på éin stad, med t.d. Google Calendar, Outlook og CalDAV.
Een slimme, lichtgewichte agendatoepassing waarmee meerdere agenda’s, zoals Google kalender, Outlook and CalDAV, op één plek beheerd en gesynchroniseerd kunnen worden.
En slank og lett kalender applikasjon som synkroniserer og forvalter flere kalendere på ett sted, som Google Calendar, Outlook og CalDAV.
aplikasi kalendar yang tipis dan ringan yang menyegerak dan mengurusi beberapa kalendar-kalendar dalam satu tempat, seperti Google Calendar, Outlook, dan CalDAV.
Google कॅलेंडर, Outlook आणि CalDAV सारख्या एकाच ठिकाणी एकाधिक कॅलेंडर समक्रमित आणि व्यवस्थापित करणारे एक हलके कॅलेंडर अॅप.
Grakšti, supaprastinta kalendoriaus programa, kuri sinchronizuoja ir tvarko kelis kalendorius, tokius kaip Google kalendorius, Outlook ir CalDAV, vienoje vietoje.
구글 캘린더, 아웃룩, CalDAV 등과 같은 여러 가지 일정 관리 도구들을 한 곳에서 동기화하고 관리할 수 있는 작고 가벼운 일정관리 앱.
スリムで軽量なカレンダーアプリです。Google カレンダー や Outlook、CalDav などの複数のカレンダーを同期して一か所で管理できます。
Una app calendario leggera che sincronizza e gestisce più calendari contemporaneamente, come Google Calendar, Outlook e CalDAV.
Aplikasi kalender yang ramping dan ringan yang menyelaraskan dan mengelola beberapa kalender di satu tempat, seperti Google Kalender, Outlook, dan CalDAV.
Egy karcsú és könnyű naptáralkalmazás, amellyel egyhelyről kezelhet és szinkronizálhat többféle naptárat is, például: Google Naptár, Outlook vagy CalDav.
Jednostavna, lagana za korištenje aplikacija kalendara koja usklađuje i upravlja s više kalendara iz jednog mjesta, poput Google kalendara, Outlooka i CalDAV-a.
एक हल्का कैलेंडर ऐप, जो Google कैलेंडर, आउटलुक और CalDAV जैसी एक जगह में कई कैलेंडर को सिंक और प्रबंधित करता है।
יישום לוח שנה קל ורזה שמסנכרן ומנהל לוחות שנה מרובים במקום אחד, כמו Google Calendar, Outlook ו־CalDAV.
Unha aplicación de calendario lixeira que permite xestionar multiples calendarios nun só lugar, como Google Calendar, Outlook e CalDAV.
Une application légère et rapide qui gère et synchronise de multiples calendriers en un seul endroit, comme Google Calendar, Outlook et CalDAV.
Näppärä kalenterisovellus, jonka avulla synkronoit ja hallitset useita kalentereita keskitetysti. Tuettuja ovat muun muassa Google-kalenteri, Outlook ja CalDAV-kalenterit.
Minimaalne ning kiire kalendri rakendus mis sünkroniseerib ja haldab mitmeid kalendreid, nagu Google kalender, Outlook ja CalDav ühes kohas.
Una aplicación de calendario liviana que sincroniza y gestiona calendarios, tales como Google Calendar, Outlook y CalDAV, en un solo lugar.
Jen malpeza, rapida kalendara aplikaĵo, kiu sinkronigas kaj mastrumas plurajn kalendarojn, en ununura loko, ekzemple el Google Calendar, Outlook kaj CalDAV.
A slim, lightweight calendar app that syncs and manages multiple calendars in one place, like Google Calendar, Outlook and CalDAV.
A slim, lightweight calendar app that syncs and manages multiple calendars in one place, like Google Calendar, Outlook and CalDAV.
A slim, lightweight calendar app that syncs and manages multiple calendars in one place, like Google Calendar, Outlook and CalDAV.
Eine schlanke Kalenderanwendung zur zentralen Synchronisation und Verwaltung mehrerer Kalender und Protokolle – wie z.B. Google Kalender, Outlook und CalDAV.
En enkel kalender app, der synkroniserer og samlet styrer flere kalendere, ligesom Google Kalender, Outlook og CalDAV.
Malá a jednoduchá aplikace, umožňující synchronizaci a správu více kalendářů z jednoho místa, jako například Google Kalendáře, Outlooku a CalDAVu.
ڕۆژژمێریکی سووکەڵە و ناسک کە سەرجەم ڕۆژژمێرەکانی ترت وەکو گوگڵ و ئاوتلوک و کاڵداڤ لەگەڵ خۆی هاوکات دەکات.
Una aplicació lleugera de calendari que sincronitza i gestiona diversos calendaris en un sol lloc, com ara Google Calendar, Outlook i CalDAV.
Lagana kalendarska aplikacija za sinhronizaciju i vođenje više kalendara kao što su Google kalendar, Outlook i CalDAV, sve na jednom mjestu.
Лека програма, която синхронизира и управлява множество календари на едно място - например Календар на Гугъл, Аутлук и CalDAV.
تطبيق تقويم سريع وخفيف يقوم بمزامنة وإدارة عدة تقاويم في مكان واحد ، مثل تقويم Google و Outlook و CalDAV.
Kalɛnda dwumadie a etumi hyehyɛ kalɛnda ahoroɔ te sɛ Google Kalɛnda, Outlook ne CalDAV wɔ baabi faako.
Minor Updates:

ul.li: Updated app icon
Updated translations

description.p: Features:

ul.li: Ask for confirmation before deleting events
Follow email and web links in the event description with Control + Click

description.p: Fixes:

ul.li: Disabled checkbox "Mark as default calendar" in calendar settings, if the calendar is read-only
Removed no longer needed sandbox permission for accounts service
Fixed potential memory leak

description.p: Fixes:

ul.li: Ensure Calendar runs in the background on startup
Fix memory leak when getting timezone information
Reliably read Windows-style timezones

description.p: Minor Updates:

ul.li: Updated translations

description.p: Fixes:

ul.li: Fix notification icons in the notification indicator
Fix an issue where event timezones were overwritten
Ensure Calendar is launched when notifications are clicked

description.p: Minor Updates:

ul.li: Updated translations

description.p: Fixes:

ul.li: Fix broken calendar color with some online providers
Fix an issue with some all-day events

description.p: Minor Updates:

ul.li: Updated translations

description.p: New Features:

ul.li: Import ICS files from the gear menu
Support the dark style

description.p: Fixes:

ul.li: Properly show events on the last day of the month
Fix end times for all-day events
Notify for all alarms on an event

description.p: Minor Updates:

ul.li: Improved offline support
New colorful avatar fallbacks
Include "film" as an event icon keyword
Add Mint and Bubblegum to calendar color chooser
Link to Online Accounts settings in the gear menu
Performance improvements
Updated translations

description.p: New Features:

ul.li: Add "Duplicate..." option to event context menu

description.p: Minor Updates:

ul.li: Fix an issue where new events could appear twice in Calendar
"Mark as default calendar" box is now correctly checked when editing a calendar
Updated translations

description.p: Improvements:

ul.li: Allow modification of recurring events
Improve handling of week start day
Fix timezone errors with all-day events

description.p: Minor Updates:

ul.li: Don't resize the sidebar when resizing the window
Updated translations

description.p: Minor Updates:

ul.li: Fix issues with time zones not being recognized
Updated translations

description.p: Minor Updates:

ul.li: Fix several issues with adding and removing monthly recurring events
Updated translations

description.p: Minor Updates:

ul.li: Correctly save event reminders
Ellipsize event participant details if necessary
Fix unwanted rescheduling when editing event title
Updated translations

description.p: Fix crash when editing an event with no location
Fix potential crash when loading events with no start or end time
Make agenda pane fill the whole space
Set the suggested time for new events to the next whole hour
Fix issues with recurring events
Performance improvements
Updated translations
Present import window when opening ICS files
Add a search entry for calendars
Always use calendar icon in notifications
Agenda view can now be navigated by keyboard
Right-to-left improvements
Various UI overhauls including lime accent color
Overall code cleanup and rewrites
Updated translations
Styling adjustments
Fix location panel initialization
New translations
Update wingpanel-indicator-datetime settings path.
New translations.
Various bug fixes and improvements.
Fixes for calendar accuracy and integrity issues.
Fixes exporting, importing and printing calendars.
Various bug fixes and improvements.
